item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi! My name is Tristan Pestoni Garcia. I’m 21 years old and I’m studying Computer Science at my home university, although right now I’m on an Erasmus in VILNIUS TECH.

I love listening to music, and like stuff like technology and videogames. I also like reading and, if my brain is ever in the mood, writing.
